EmailTemplate.subject: The Bright Ops Future: Reinventing Operations In The Age Of Cloud-Native IT​
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
In the whirlwind of digital business where web, mobile and now line-of-business app growth is exploding across every industry, how should operations teams respond? Do you add more people, automate what your experts already do, or is there another way?
Join​ ​​guest speaker​ <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14891/256755]]> Forrester Principal Analyst Dave Bartoletti and John Allwright from Pivotal for an interactive discussion about how leading companies have successfully transformed their operations function​s to accelerate digital transformation.​​
They will share​ ​data and research on how operations​ ​​teams are moving from being cost centers to the engine powering modern app development -- and how modern apps delivers value to the business beyond infrastructure efficiency.​
Webinar Details: Date: Thursday, May 18 Time: 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT Register Here <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14891/256755]]>
